files.patch:
@@ -102,0 +102,6 @@ + * + *

  • {@systemProperty jdk.httpserver.attributes} (default: "")
    + * Prior to JDK 26, the HttpExchange attribute map was shared with the enclosing HttpContext. + * Since JDK 26, by default, exchange attributes are per-exchange and the context attributes must + * be accessed by calling getHttpContext().getAttributes(). Set this property to "context" + * to restore the pre JDK 26 behavior.
